name: PAT_ENC_HOSP_PROB
description: The PAT_ENC_HOSP_PROB contains the hospital problems for each hospital encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique (LPL) ID for a problem associated with this hospital encounter.

columns.name: PRINCIPAL_PROB_YN
columns.description: A flag to indicate if this problem is currently marked as the principal hospital problem.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the deployment owner for this contact.
